original_text: So they said to Peter, ‘You stayed in the house of men who were not circumcised. You even ate meals with them!’
korean_text: 이르되 네가 무할례자의 집에 들어가 함께 먹었다 하니

sentences.original_text: You stayed in the house of men
You even ate meals with them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 심지어 그들과 함께 식사까지 했습니다
